mapper.sql: SELECT sm.stack_measurement_id, sm.stack_id, sm.pollutant_id, sm.cycle_type, sm.is_completed, p.pollutant_name, p.pollutant_name_en, p.method FROM stack_measurement `sm` INNER JOIN pollutant `p` on sm.pollutant_id = p.pollutant_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stack_measurement (stack_id, pollutant_id, cycle_type, is_completed) VALUES (#{stack_id}, #{pollutant_id}, #{cycle_type}, #{is_completed})
